mgi.report.reader 0.0.9.9000
  • Reports
    Mouse Genetic Markers
    All Markers (MRK_List1.rpt) Official Markers (MRK_List2.rpt)
    Sequence Data
    Marker Coordinates (MGI_MRK_Coord.rpt) Gene Model Coordinates (MGI_Gene_Model_Coord.rpt) Sequence Coordinates (MGI_GTGUP.gff) GenBank, RefSeq and Ensembl IDs (MRK_Sequence.rpt) UniProtKB Swiss-Prot and TrEMBL (MRK_SwissProt_TrEMBL.rpt) UniProtKB Swiss-Prot (MRK_SwissProt.rpt) Gene Traps (MRK_GeneTrap.rpt) Ensembl IDs (MRK_ENSEMBL.rpt) Ensembl/NCBI Biotype Conflicts (MGI_BioTypeConflict.rpt) Primer Pairs (PRB_PrimerSeq.rpt) InterPro Domains (MGI_InterProDomains.rpt)
